alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 8:18PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Paz County through 915 PM MST... At 818 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Bouse, or 24 miles southwest of Alamo Lake, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern La Paz County. This includes AZ Route 72 between mile markers 35 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
